item.title: tri-x 400
item.description: this was my first roll of black + white film. i have to say, i had a lot of fun shooting with it because i wasn’t preoccupied with colour and got to focus instead on the moods and shadows of the shots. people here’s my friend sib, writing a message to his friend. my girlfriend joey. events these next few shots are from a protest in toronto. thousands of people had gathered to speak out against the horrific crimes of the zionist occupation of palestine.

item.title: portra 800
item.description: portra 800 is probably my favourite film to shoot with. once i’d gotten comfortable enough with the gold 200, i wanted to elevate my colour game with a more light sensitive film and this one is definitely up there. people some shots of friends: sib + kubba, hyder, nisan, and natasha. bonus one of joey. it came out a bit dark, but i kind of like it. also found this one i took of sib having a smoke on a rainy day.
